title: Protein desulfurization and deselenization
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00135D, Tutorial Review
Vincent Diemer, Eliott Roy, Vangelis Agouridas, Oleg Melnyk
Chopping protein thiols or selenols provides powerful tools for chemical protein synthesis.
